product_name: White Sierra Gobi Desert Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes - Special Buy
long_description: Giving you sun protection and cooling comfort, the long-sleeve women's White Sierra Gobi Desert plus-size shirt is ideal for summer adventures and hiking in the sun. Soft polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly so you stay more comfortable even as you work up a sweat. Fabric provides UPF 30 protection from harmful solar rays. Mesh-lined rear vents increase comfort in hot weather. Zippered security side pocket conceals valuables. Special buy.
short_description: Giving you sun protection and cooling comfort, the long-sleeve women's White Sierra Gobi Desert plus-size shirt is ideal for summer adventures and hiking in the sun.
